name: Cardiology
description: We offer complete heathcare to individuals.Cardiology is a branch of medicine that deals with the disorders of the heart as well as some parts of the circulatory system.

name: Dental Care
description: Dental treatment is the treatment of teeth.We offer complete heathcare to individuals in this treatment.We give special care to indiidual person.

name: Eye Care
description: Ophthalmology is a branch of medicine and surgery that deals with the diagnosis and treatment of disorders of the eye. We offer complete heathcare to individuals in this treatment.

name: Neurology
description: Neurology is the branch of medicine concerned with the study and treatment of disorders of the nervous system. The nervous system is a complex, sophisticated system that regulates and coordinates body activities. We offer complete heathcare to individuals.

name: Urology
description: Urology is a part of health care that deals with diseases of the male and female urinary tract (kidneys, ureters, bladder and urethra). It also deals with the male organs that are able to make babies.We offer complete heathcare to individuals.

name: Body Surgery
description: Surgery is a medical or dental specialty that uses operative manual and instrumental techniques on a person to investigate or treat a pathological condition such as a disease or injury, to help improve bodily function.We offer complete heathcare to individuals.
